item.title: RSBuddy or Powerbot?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:36, topic:398654”][quote author=SETO link=topic=495791.msg3629995#msg3629995 date=1308143860]
and for the love of god its not open source…so you don’t know what’s going on in their head…and they claim all scripts are checked for malicious code then uploaded
[/quote]
So, do you run any distro of Windows?

And so far, RSBuddy has not pulled anything malicious, however RSBot has (and they’re open source).[/quote]
Add to that the fact that powerbot actually did infect our computers (editing the host files and stopping rsbuddy from running) and you start wondering what good open source is.

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy or Powerbot?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

SETO:

and for the love of god its not open source…so you don’t know what’s going on in their head…and they claim all scripts are checked for malicious code then uploaded

So, do you run any distro of Windows?

And so far, RSBuddy has not pulled anything malicious, however RSBot has (and they’re open source).

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy or Powerbot?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“SETO, post:34, topic:398654”]RsBuddy is cool due to all the hype…they have nothing new that already exists, their script adding system has been done before…and for the love of god its not open source…so you don’t know what’s going on in their head…and they claim all scripts are checked for malicious code then uploaded, only if you know how easy it is to add scripts to the respiratory (how bs it is)…
Also rs buddy’s respiratory is down majority of the time (means you can’t bot).

rsbuddy is cool or popular because its cool to hate powerbot.[/quote]Thing is you don’t worry as much about the head or source when the bot isn’t run by a money hungry liar like Paris. And it IS easy to upload, it’s a form you fill in and you upload your code. Malicious code is flagged and checked one-by-one. And it’s not down the majority of the time, this last week or so they’ve been upgrading and had some issues.

And it’s not cool to hate powerbot, it’s smart.

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy or Powerbot?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

RsBuddy is cool due to all the hype…they have nothing new that already exists, their script adding system has been done before…and for the love of god its not open source…so you don’t know what’s going on in their head…and they claim all scripts are checked for malicious code then uploaded, only if you know how easy it is to add scripts to the respiratory (how bs it is)…
Also rs buddy’s respiratory is down majority of the time (means you can’t bot).

rsbuddy is cool or popular because its cool to hate powerbot.

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy or Powerbot?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:32, topic:398654”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=495791.msg3628243#msg3628243 date=1308002728]

Considering RSBot is now ran by a sandnigger who forces users to see advertisements and modifies the local DNS of his user-base’s machines…

Which means?
[/quote]They edited the host file of all windows users so that rsbuddy.com wouldn’t load. It’s illegal and they were threatened with legal persecution.[/quote]
my hosts file was edited so it wouldn’t load powerbot.org =p don’t know what/who did it.

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy or Powerbot?
item.dc:creator: @Jrekko Jrekko
item.description:
@Jrekko wrote:

RSBuddy is much better imo. Easier to use, more reliable and you don’t have to deal with Paris. And it’s not that hard to access the source code of it… You just need to know what you’re doing.

item.title: RSBuddy or Powerbot?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:25, topic:398654”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=495791.msg3625502#msg3625502 date=1307811237]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=495791.msg3625020#msg3625020 date=1307762165]
People have different reasons to bot, not everyone does it to make cash. And a lot of free scripts are just as good as paid ones, you’re getting ripped off. Free scripts are usually fine.
[/quote]No usually the free scripts are horribly written. I’ve gotten banned using free scripts, never have I once with paid.
[/quote]And I’ve never gotten banned with free scripts. You just need to find the well written ones.[/quote]

I’ve gotten banned once on a guy sudukoing but I’ve botted many times overnight (7-10 hours) without ban at all.

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy or Powerbot?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:15, topic:398654”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=495791.msg3624758#msg3624758 date=1307741470]

Neither. Free bots are for kids who don’t want to get far in Rs.

That’s not true at all, I got so much 99’s with RSBuddy without paying.

If you can’t afford a $20 script then you should probably not be on the computer and should be working.

I use paid scripts on a large scale which makes bank irl.
[/quote]People have different reasons to bot, not everyone does it to make cash. And a lot of free scripts are just as good as paid ones, you’re getting ripped off. Free scripts are usually fine.[/quote]

I’ve only been banned when using free scripts. Maybe there are some good free scripts but ill stick with mine.

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy or Powerbot?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

I’ve used both, and they both have their ups and downs. But rsbot (powerbot) is open source- and in the event it gets taken down, people will be able to build off of it. If rsbuddy gets taken down and you paid $100 on scripts, then you wasted $100. Same thing happened with kbot.

What is this about rsbuddy being more trustworthy? Is it because lots of their scripts are loaded through their site, or because the bot makers don’t supply the user’s with the bot client itself’s source code? Just curious how people’s logic works…

Read full topic

item.description:

Rsbuddy because I don’t have to do all that stuff to just add a script.
